name: Hewitt'sMovieFinder
0:
”Alexa ask Hewitt's Movie Finder find Star Wars”
”Alexa ask Hewitt's Movie Finder find Harry Potter”
”Alexa ask Hewitt's Movie Finder find Divergent”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hewitt's movie finder
des: This skill makes it easy to find a streaming service that has the movie you want. Instead of searching through every streaming service you are subscribed to, simply ask Alexa. This skill's searching algorithm uses Google's Custom Search Engine API to look through the internet and find all the places a movie can possibly be watched. Because we search for data in real time, our results will always be up-to-date. Hewitt's Movie Finder is intended to be simple, so you can search for any movie in a single sentence. To search, say "Alexa ask Hewitt's Movie Finder find" and then say your desired movie. Alexa will respond with your answers in a concise and simple sentence, so that you can save time and start watching that movie. Happy searching!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
